characteristics.name: Wild Down
characteristics.description: Enemies Near main target take half damage.

characteristics.name: Spread
characteristics.description: Spend X Ammo to target an additional target near the main target. Targets hit by this are staggered

characteristics.name: Wild Down
characteristics.description: Stagger and enemy, if Critical, topple and Taunt them.

passives.name: Charger
passives.description: If you move before attacking, your attacks Shove enemies 1 rangeband away from you.

passives.name: Supershield
passives.description: Gain 5 x Tier DEF. Allies Near you gain +5 DEF and cannot be Stunned.

passives.name: The Wall
passives.description: Once per round, an enemy must make a Stamina Test to move past you. If they fail, you Taunt them.
